uas.lntv.pacmangame.Scenes

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • uas.lntv.pacmangame.Scenes.Controller
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ControllerButtons, ControllerJoystick

    public abstract class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates a on screen controller. Depending on the child class this can be on screen buttons or a Joystick which is visible on touchdown

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        public Controller(Assets assets,
                  MapScreen screen)
        Constructor which initialises all the nessesary variables for the creation of a controller. It stores the currently displayed Mapscreen for its child classes.
        Parameters:
        assets - provide the Assetsmanager instance for building the controller.
        screen - instance of a Screen which will contain the controller

    • Method Detail

      • isUpPressed

        public boolean isUpPressed()

        public boolean isDownPressed()

        public boolean isLeftPressed()

      • isRightPressed

        public boolean isRightPressed()

      • isTouchEvent

        public boolean isTouchEvent()

      • setPause

        public void setPause(float x,
                     float y)
        If the top of the screen is touched the pause menu will activate. It will check if PauseReady() determined a touch input at the top of the screen and double checks it again. if everything is true the pause menu will be activated
        Parameters:
        x - x-value of the touch input
        y - y-value of the touch input

      • pulledInput

        public void pulledInput()
        Resets the direction. Avoids handing over the same direction a several times.

      • ready

        public void ready(float x,
                  float y)
        This will check if the user activates the pause menu. It checks if the touch input correspond with a rectangle zone at the top of the screen.
        Parameters:
        x - x-value of the touch input
        y - y-value of the touch input

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Disposes the controller.

      • resize

        public void resize(int width,
                   int height)
        Resize the viewport of the controller
        Parameters:
        width - new width of the viewport
        height - new height of the viewport
